title: 10-Minute Core Workout For Lower Back Pain Relief [NO MORE BACK PAIN!]
description:
Strengthen your core and eliminate lower back pain in just 10 minutes a day! This simple, effective core workout routine will strengthen key muscles in your core to stabilize your back and decrease pain. Increase core strength in your abs, obliques, back, and hips to eliminate pain and feel better fast!

======================================
LINK TO JARED’S THICK EXERCISE MAT: https://urlgeni.us/amzn/drjaredexercisemat
======================================

WHY DOES YOUR LOWER BACK HURT?
One of the main causes of lower back pain is weakness in your core.

Your lumbar vertebrae (your lower back bones) should be a very stable column when it is supported correctly by your core muscles.

When these muscles are weak the column becomes lax and unstable which often results in lower back pain.

WHY IS CORE STRENGTH IMPORTANT?
If you can strengthen the right core muscles with the right exercises, it will improve the stability in your lower back. This will allow you to perform more activities (like sitting, standing, walking and moving) without pain. 

Basically having adequate core strength can alleviate (and even eliminate) lower back pain! That’s exactly what I want to share with you in this video!

BEST CORE EXERCISES FOR LOWER BACK PAIN
As a physical therapist, these are the exercises I regularly give to patients to strengthen their core and hips, improve stability in their lower back, and eliminate pain.

It only takes 10 minutes to perform and trains every major muscle that influences the lower back. This is a complete core strengthening routine and I hope you get some great benefit from performing it regularly.

10-MINUTE CORE WORKOUT ROUTINE FOR LOWER BACK PAIN

0:00 Intro
0:24 10-Minute Workout Routine
10:37 Don't Miss This!

Single Leg Bridge (Left)
Single Leg Bridge (Right)
Side Plank Hip Lift (Left)
Side Plank Hip Lift (Right)
Bird Dog
Plank
Upper Circle Crunch
Reverse Crunch
Table Top Toe Tap
Swimmer
Don't Miss This

💬 Did you try the back pain routine in this video? What did you think? I LOVE hearing from you - leave your experience in a COMMENT and let me know how you feel!

channelDescription:
Hi - I'm Jared! I am a doctor of physical therapy who specializes in rehabilitating orthopedic (back, neck, shoulder, knee, etc) and postpartum (diastasis recti) conditions. I love being fit, healthy, strong, and active, and hope to help you accomplish your fitness goals. On this channel you'll learn best treatments for common injuries through exercising and stretching, and how to become a fitter, healthier version of yourself. Please consider subscribing!

comments: Did you try this routine? What did you think? COMMENT your experience below and be sure to follow it up with my favorite stretching routine for your hips and lower back: https://youtu.be/nm-fxV-bwWg Hope it helps you to improve and feel better 🙏🏼

I am 28 with degenerative disc disease, arthritis in my back, a herniated disc, and a pinched sciatic nerve. I was bedridden and in the ER five days ago, and now I’m up moving and doing mostly normal activities. The only reason I’m up is because I’ve been doing these stretches and exercises multiple times a day. This video has been a lifesaver.
I almost died of lower back pain last week. These exercises are helping me tremendously. I’m truly amazed how something so simple can help crippling pain.

I have avoided core exercises for years, primarily because they would hurt my lower back. However I've been doing this one for a few weeks now and no lower back pain and I feel that my core is getting stronger. Great job, thank you for putting this together

48 years old. Generally healthy, never had back problems, and then had my back “go out” with such pain/spasm that I could barely walk for a week. After the pain subsided, the weakness felt constant. Doc recommended core strengthening exercises and this easy-to-follow video has been wonderful. Doing daily for 2 weeks and feeling stronger/less weak. Thanks!
